mapper.select: SELECT t.JOB_ID AS jobId, t.`USER_ID` AS userId, t.`JOB_CID` AS jobCId, t.`TITLE`, t.`CYCLE`, t.`SALARY`, t.`WORK_ADDRESS` AS workAddress, t.`JOB_NATURE` AS jobNature, t.`WORK_YEAR` AS workYear, t.`EDUCATION`, t.`REMARK`, t.`TYPE`, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate FROM basis_tb_job t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_job ( USER_ID, JOB_CID, TITLE, CYCLE, SALARY, WORK_ADDRESS, JOB_NATURE, WORK_YEAR, EDUCATION, REMARK, TYPE, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{jobCId}, #{title}, #{cycle}, #{salary}, #{workAddress}, #{jobNature}, #{workYear}, #{education}, #{remark}, #{type}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
